<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Magical Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=6251) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=237)

**Prerequisites**
[Magical Scholastics](/Feats.aspx?ID=6247)

</column>

---

You broaden the scope of your magical understanding, allowing you to find the right path, detect hidden objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals. You can cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445), [_locate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1588), and [_veil of privacy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739) as occult innate spells, each once per day. You can cast this _veil of privacy_ spell only on an object, and it's automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.
name: Greater Magical Scholastics
